title: Sen. Warren pushes Altman for guarantee OpenAI isn’t seeking government bailout
full_text:
Sen. Warren pushes Altman for guarantee OpenAI isn’t seeking government bailout. Senator Elizabeth Warren (D-MA) is pushing OpenAI for assurances it won't seek a government bailout if it doesn't turn a profit. In a letter to CEO Sam Altman, Warren says she is concerned that the company is preparing to fall back "on the classic strategy of….
OpenAIs sprawling web of debt-based partnerships mean it would still benefit from an industry-wide bailout. OpenAIs sprawling web of debt-based partnerships mea… [+4772 chars]
